title: César E. Chávez National Monument: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions       Our physical address is 29700 Woodford-Tehachapi Road, Keene, CA 93531. (Please send mail to PO Box 201, Keene, CA 93531.)  By Car From Los Angeles (coming from the south): Take I-5 North towards Sacramento. Take the exit for State Route 14 North toward Palmdale/Lancaster.  Merge onto CA-14 North. Continue onto CA-58 BUS West. Turn left to merge onto CA-58 West. Take exit 139 toward Keene. Turn right toward Woodford-Tehachapi Road. Turn right at Woodford-Tehachapi Road. César E. Chávez National Monument will be on your left. Google Maps URL: http://g.co/maps/dqnpv  From Bakersfield (coming from the northwest): Take CA-58 East (the Barstow-Bakersfield Hwy / Blue Star Memorial Hwy). Take exit 139 toward Keene. Turn left toward Woodford-Tehachapi Road. Turn right at Woodford-Tehachapi Road.  César E. Chávez National Monument will be on your left. Google Maps URL: http://g.co/maps/6drtp        Driving to César E. Chávez National Monument
